title: Paolo Mascatelli

headings.text: Your Brand Deserves Better Than Template Navigation
Built for Performance, Designed for Luxury

Stop Looking Like A Template.
Start Looking Like A Brand.

sections.heading:
Luxury Navigation.
Zero Code.
text: High-end luxury platform-agnostic UX/UI augmentation for open-source platforms. Built for boutique brands who refuse to look basic.
AiPhlo 1.0 optimized for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0 · Custom integrations available for all platforms based on project scope
You've built something beautiful. Your products are premium. Your brand is distinctive. But your navigation? It screams "I used a template."

High-end brands spend $50K-$150K on custom development for navigation systems that feel intuitive, look cinematic, and guide customers seamlessly through their story. Until now, that level of polish was out of reach for emerging luxury brands and boutiques.
Not anymore.
Smart Navigation Systems for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0
AiPhlo 1.0 is specifically optimized for Squarespace sites. Custom installation with hands-on setup tailored to your brand.
Platform-Agnostic Foundation: Need navigation for Shopify, Webflow, WordPress, or another platform? Custom integrations available based on project scope.
The Future: AiPhlo 2.0 will be a self-service subscription platform with AI-powered cross-platform features. Current buyers get lifetime access to all 2.0 features as they launch.
Cinema-grade slideshow navigation with invisible galleries
Your homepage becomes a living lookbook. Cinematic transitions. Navigation that reveals itself through interaction, not clutter.
Perfect for: Fashion brands, furniture showrooms, photographers, luxury lifestyle brands
Product gallery navigation with shoppable integration

Navigate through your product collections with smooth drop-down galleries. Link to TikTok Shop, external stores, or house products directly on-site. Fully customizable to your catalog size (up to 12+ product links per section, expandable based on your needs).
Perfect for: E-commerce brands, boutique shops, direct-to-consumer brands
Portfolio navigation that tells a story
Your work deserves more than a grid. Show project categories that expand with smooth animations, reveal case studies on hover, and guide visitors through your expertise without overwhelming them.
Perfect for: Design studios, agencies, architects, creative consultants
Gallery systems built for visual storytelling
Navigate between photo series like flipping through a high-end coffee table book. Category-based filtering, full-screen presentation modes, and mobile swipe navigation that feels native.
Perfect for: Photographers, art galleries, visual artists, stylists
Available starting at Pro tier

Transform your secondary galleries into scrollable, shoppable experiences. Your product nav becomes a full interactive gallery where customers can browse, select, and purchase—all without leaving your site.
What you get:
Pricing: Custom design fee based on project scope (number of products, integration complexity, brand customization needs).
Start a Custom Project →

Select the navigation type that matches your brand's needs. Photography nav for portfolios. Phantom galleries for product showcases. Smart Product Nav for e-commerce. Project galleries for agencies. Mix and match as needed.

We provide the luxury base—you add your brand colors, fonts, and content. Right now, each installation is hands-on and tailored to your specific needs. No coding required. Full visual customization through Squarespace's design panel.
Copy. Paste. Publish. Each system installs as a single code block in Squarespace. Takes 5 minutes. Works immediately. Updates don't break it.
Currently optimized for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0. Extensions for Shopify, Webflow, and WordPress coming in AiPhlo 2.0.
Every interaction is designed for touch. Swipes feel natural. Taps are intentional. Your mobile experience rivals your desktop.
Plays nice with your existing Squarespace setup. No theme conflicts. No plugin interference. Just clean, isolated code that works.
Search engines see your content exactly as intended. No hidden elements, no JavaScript-only navigation. Your rankings stay intact.
Squarespace updates won't break your nav. We build using stable APIs and future-proof patterns.
Custom installation included. Choose your tier based on your needs.
Tier 1: Site-Wide Nav + Project Gallery
Best for: Solo entrepreneurs, single-brand businesses
Tier 1 + Tier 2: Add Smart Product OR Photography Nav
Best for: Agencies, multi-brand owners, designers with clients
All Systems + White-Label License
Best for: Web design agencies, Squarespace experts, dev studios
The navigation systems you're seeing today are just stage one. AiPhlo 2.0 is in development with a vision that goes far beyond Squarespace.
Coming Soon:
AiPhlo 1.0 buyers get lifetime updates and early access to all 2.0 features as they launch.
Yes. AiPhlo systems are template-agnostic. Whether you're using Brine, Bedford, or any other template family, our code integrates cleanly.
Not at all. If you can copy and paste, you can install AiPhlo. We provide video walkthroughs and visual customization guides for everything.
We monitor Squarespace updates and push fixes immediately. As an AiPhlo owner, you get free updates for the duration of your license (1 year for Studio, lifetime for Pro/Agency).
Studio license is for 1 site. Pro covers 3 sites. Agency gives you unlimited white-label usage for client projects.
Custom Squarespace navigation development typically costs $5K-$15K per system. You're getting 4 systems, professionally designed and tested, for a fraction of that cost—and you own them forever.
Every purchase includes installation support. Studio gets 30 days, Pro gets 90 days, Agency gets lifetime priority support.
Your competitors are paying six figures for this level of polish. You don't have to.
30-day money-back guarantee · Questions? info@aiphlo.com
lists: Embedded purchase links for each item
Custom design matching your brand identity
Integration with external shops (TikTok Shop, Shopify, etc.)
1 Navigation System (Phantom Gallery OR Project Gallery)
1 Navigation System (Phantom Gallery OR Project Gallery)
+ Smart Product Nav OR Photography Nav
+ Smart Product Nav OR Photography Nav
Early access + beta testing for AiPhlo 2.0
Upgrade available: Scrollable/shoppable galleries (discounted custom pricing)

AI-driven navigation optimization (learns from user behavior)
Automated A/B testing for navigation patterns

fullTextPreview:
NAV
SKIP TO CONTENT
Luxury Navigation.
Zero Code.

High-end luxury platform-agnostic UX/UI augmentation for open-source platforms. Built for boutique brands who refuse to look basic.

AiPhlo 1.0 optimized for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0 · Custom integrations available for all platforms based on project scope

View Pricing
Start Custom Project
Your Brand Deserves Better Than Template Navigation
▼

You've built something beautiful. Your products are premium. Your brand is distinctive. But your navigation? It screams "I used a template."

High-end brands spend $50K-$150K on custom development for navigation systems that feel intuitive, look cinematic, and guide customers seamlessly through their story. Until now, that level of polish was out of reach for emerging luxury brands and boutiques.

Not anymore.

Plug-In Luxury: AiPhlo 1.0
▼

Smart Navigation Systems for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0

AiPhlo 1.0 is specifically optimized for Squarespace sites. Custom installation with hands-on setup tailored to your brand.

Platform-Agnostic Foundation: Need navigation for Shopify, Webflow, WordPress, or another platform? Custom integrations available based on project scope.

The Future: AiPhlo 2.0 will be a self-service subscription platform with AI-powered cross-platform features. Current buyers get lifetime access to all 2.0 features as they launch.

Navigation Systems
▼
Phantom Gallery Navigation

Cinema-grade slideshow navigation with invisible galleries

Your homepage becomes a living lookbook. Cinematic transitions. Navigation that reveals itself through interaction, not clutter.

Custom animated reveals
Touch-responsive on mobile
Zero impact on load times
Integrates with existing Squarespace galleries

Perfect for: Fashion brands, furniture showrooms, photographers, luxury lifestyle brands

Smart Product Nav

Product gallery navigation with shoppable integration

Navigate through your product collections with smooth drop-down galleries. Link to TikTok Shop, external stores, or house products directly on-site. Fully customizable to your catalog size (up to 12+ product links per section, expandable based on your needs).

Horizontal scrolling product galleries
Custom hover animations and transitions
External shop integration (TikTok, Shopify, etc.)
Mobile-optimized swipe navigation

Perfect for: E-commerce brands, boutique shops, direct-to-consumer brands

Project Reveal System

Portfolio navigation that tells a story

Your work deserves more than a grid. Show project categories that expand with smooth animations, reveal case studies on hover, and guide visitors through your expertise without overwhelming them.

Expandable category cards
Inline project previews
Client logo integration
Seamless Squarespace CMS integration

Perfect for: Design studios, agencies, architects, creative consultants

Photography Nav

Gallery systems built for visual storytelling

Navigate between photo series like flipping through a high-end coffee table book. Category-based filtering, full-screen presentation modes, and mobile swipe navigation that feels native.

Collection-based organization
Lightbox integration
EXIF data display options
Client-ready presentation mode

Perfect for: Photographers, art galleries, visual artists, stylists

Upgrade: Scrollable & Shoppable Galleries
▼

Available starting at Pro tier

Transform your secondary galleries into scrollable, shoppable experiences. Your product nav becomes a full interactive gallery where customers can browse, select, and purchase—all without leaving your site.

What you get:

Horizontal scrolling product galleries
Embedded purchase links for each item
Custom design matching your brand identity
Integration with external shops (TikTok Shop, Shopify, etc.)
Mobile-optimized swipe navigation
Seamless on-page shopping experience

Pricing: Custom design fee based on project scope (number of products, integration complexity, brand customization needs).

Start a Custom Project →

Three Steps to Six-Figure Navigation
▼
01
Choose Your System

Select the navigation type that matches your brand's needs. Photography nav for portfolios. Phantom galleries for product showcases. Smart Product Nav for e-commerce. Project galleries for agencies. Mix and match as needed.

02
Customize Your Style

We provide the luxury base—you add your brand colors, fonts, and content. Right now, each installation is hands-on and tailored to your specific needs. No coding required. Full visual customization through Squarespace's design panel.

03
Install & Launch

Copy. Paste. Publish. Each system installs as a single code block in Squarespace. Takes 5 minutes. Works immediately. Updates don't break it.

Built for Performance, Designed for Luxury
▼
✓ Platform Agnostic Foundation

Currently optimized for Squarespace 7.1 & 7.0. Extensions for Shopify, Webflow, and WordPress coming in AiPhlo 2.0.

✓ Mobile-First Engineering

Every interaction is designed for touch. Swipes feel natural. Taps are intentional. Your mobile experience r
